name: obsidian-rpg-player-notes
description: Obsidian.md plugin for RPG players who like to take notes during sessions. Currently it adds a command to create new notes of various types, using the selected text as a title (or specifying a title if no text is selected) and put them into predefined folders, all configurable in the plugin settings.

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
